repo_description: Hot Chocolate is a GraphQL server, written in C# for .Net Core and .Net Framework

schemas.name: schema_with_multiline_descriptions.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
Query
Line 1
Line 2
"""
type Query {
  """
  translate
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  translate(
    """
    fromLanguage
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    fromLanguage: Language

    """
    toLanguage
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    toLanguage: Language

    """
    text
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    text: String
  ): String
}

"""
Language
Line 1
Line 2
"""
enum Language {
  """
  EN
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  EN

  """
  FR
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  FR

  """
  CH
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  CH
}

"""
AandB
Line 1
Line 2
"""
union AandB = A | B

"""
interface
C
Line 1
Line 2
"""
interface C {
  """
  interface
  translate
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  translate(
    """
    interface
    fromLanguage
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    fromLanguage: Language

    """
    interface
    toLanguage
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    toLanguage: Language

    """
    interface
    text
    Line 1
    Line 2
    """
    text: String
  ): String
}

"""
foo
Line 1
Line 2
"""
input Foo {
  """
  bar
  Line 1
  Line 2
  """
  bar: String
}

type A { a: String }
type B { b: String }
